snippet.title: Viridi Steam Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Nurture a small pot of succulents that grow in real time. Viridi is a safe haven, a place you can return to for a moment of peace and quiet whenever you need it.

Play now! (Android, iOS, Steam): http://www.icewatergames.com/viridi
About Ice Water Games: https://linktr.ee/icewatergames

Trailer by Madison Pathe.
